## About Me

I am a PhD candidate at the Department of Social and Economic Sciences,
Sapienza University of Rome.

My research focuses on corporate finance, with particular attention to:

- Voluntary delisting  
- Corporate governance  
- Board incentives and monitoring  
- Real options and technological change  

I combine theoretical modeling with empirical and simulation-based analysis.
